comments.body: That's a better default but it might bite us. @artwr , we'll have to make sure that we set the extra to NOSASL.

The defaults of impyla differ from pyhs2: as it takes impala as a base for which NOSASL is default while for Hive in a standard setup it is PLAIN. I took hive as default. But yes you should be careful here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +422,426 @@    def get_conn(self):
        db = self.get_connection(self.hiveserver2_conn_id)
        auth_mechanism = db.extra_dejson.get('authMechanism', 'PLAIN')
        kerberos_service_name = None
        if configuration.get('core', 'security') == 'kerberos':
